projects.title: Cultural Exchange Platform
projects.bodyText:
- A full-stack MERN platform designed to enable international students to share and explore cultural traditions. 
 - This platform supports over 24 active users and includes features such as user authentication with JWT, Google Translate API integration for multilingual support, and text-to-audio functionality to enhance accessibility.

projects.title: Brain Tumor Classification
projects.bodyText:
- A deep learning-based system designed for the classification of brain tumors using MRI images.  
 - The project involved fine-tuning the model with TensorFlow and enhancing accuracy with image processing and data augmentation, achieving 89.54% accuracy

projects.title: BackSpace
projects.bodyText:
- A mobile application designed to connect the LUMS student community of more than 1000 students 
 - Include features such as real-time chat, instructor reviews, adding, deleting a post and search functionality

projects.title: Large Language Model Benchmarking
projects.bodyText:
- Led a study benchmarking LLMs like Mistral, Falcon, and LLama2 for replicating developer feedback. 
 - Analyzed 3,000+ feedback instances scraped from Stack Exchange and Reddit using prompt engineering and evaluated model performance with Cosine Similarity and ROUGE-L Score

projects.title: Securing Software Installations using Deep Graph Learning
projects.bodyText:
- Developed an autoencoder-based tool using TensorFlow with GCN and MLP to detect malicious software installation behavior 
 - Enhanced model performance using Word2Vec for node embeddings and streamlined log processing in Postgres with Bash and Python

projects.title: BriefBox
projects.bodyText:
- BriefBox is an application integrating OpenAI API to generate concise and brief overviews of articles and blogs 
 - It uses Tailwind CSS and localstorage to provide faster data retrieval and dynamic UI updates

projects.title: Anime World
projects.bodyText: - Anime World, built with React Native, offers the latest anime series across various genres with a seamless interface for iOS and Android users.

projects.title: TV Shows: Cleaning and Exploration
projects.bodyText:
- Analyzed TV show data from streaming platforms to identify viewer trends and preferences 
 - Performed data cleaning, preporcessing, and made predictions based insights

projects.title: Board Sequence Game
projects.bodyText: - A multiplayer game of Sequence for four players (2 in each team). Player 1 and 3 will be team 1 and player 2 and 4 will be team 2 by default.

projects.title: CareerMatch
projects.bodyText:
- A recommender system that utilizes machine learning to analyze resumes and recommends the top 5 jobs that align with an individual's skills and experience. 
 - It uses Streamlit-based user interface for easy resume upload and job recommendation retrieval.

projects.title: Chatbot
projects.bodyText: - A simple chatbot designed to use Google's PaLM 2 API for efficiently handling and responding to user queries.

projects.title: C Scanner
projects.bodyText: - Haskell code that scans a C/C++ file, takes a sequence of characters (the source file of the program) and produces a sequence of tokens

projects.title: Container Escape CVEs
projects.bodyText:
- The project contains information on various Container Escape CVEs along with their Proof of Concepts, including complete setup and execution instructions. 
- Additionally, the project includes audit logs and malicious subgraphs for each CVE.
